name: Single Player Trading Market
description: A utility to roughly incorporate the multiplayer trading economy responsibly into single player.
author: Paige

config.name: Rune Trades
config.description: Enables rune conversions that align with online pricing.

config.name: Torch and Key Trades
config.description: Enables the buying and selling of Keys, Uber Statues, and Torches.

config.name: Unique and Set Trades
config.description: Enables the buying and selling of Keys and Torches.

config.name: Junk Trades
config.description: Enables the buying and selling of Keys and Torches.

config.name: Gem Trades
config.description: Enables the buying and selling of Keys and Torches.
